verses.roman:
ekādaśī, janmāṣṭamī, vāmana-dvādaśī
śrī-rāma-navamī, āra nṛsiṁha-caturdaśī

synonyms: ekādaśī—the eleventh day of the fortnight; janmāṣṭamī—the birthday ceremony of Lord Kṛṣṇa; vāmana-dvādaśī—the birthday or appearance day of Lord Vāmana; śrī-rāma-navamī—the birthday ceremony of Lord Rāmacandra; āra—and; nṛsiṁha-caturdaśī—the appearance day of Lord Nṛsiṁha.
translation: "Ekādaśī, Janmāṣṭamī, Vāmana-dvādaśī, Rāma-navamī and Nṛsiṁha-caturdaśī should all be observed.
